Header: Action taken to sort out land issues
Content: Minister of Lands and Parliamentary Reforms Gayantha Karunatilake has said necessary initiatives have been taken for the resolution of land issues of the people of the country. He said that the Land Reforms Commission has been set up and the staff increased to undertake this work. The Minister expressed these views after opening a sub office of the Land Reforms Commission in the Galle District. People who are encountering lands issued in the Elpitiya, Karandeniya, Welivitiya, Divithura, Benthota and Niyagama Divisional Secretariat Divisions will benefit by this effort. The Minister handed over deeds to 50 families that did not have land entitlements.
